name: my-github-rank
description: A simple GitHub Action to get GitHub rank of a user

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run package
scripts.setup-data: [ ! -d 'src/top-github-users' ] && git clone https://github.com/gayanvoice/top-github-users.git src/top-github-users || echo 'Data already exists'
scripts.update-data: cd src/top-github-users && git pull origin main

author: Maifee Ul Asad<maifeeulasad@gmail.com>
